tool_description:
Tagdef.com is the worlds largest hashtag dictionary. Use this api to access these definitions. The content is user-generated, and the directory currently contains over 60.000 definitions. The hashtags can have many definitions each, ordered by user-votes.

The hashtags are often related to Twitter , but is also commonly used on Pinterest and Google+ .

This API is free to use, but you must provide a clickable link back to the tagdef.com page for the given tag when using information from the API. This link can be found in the uri part of the reply.
name: Tagdef
title: Tagdef

api_list.name: Get list of definitions
api_list.description: Returns the top definitions, currently max 5. Ordered by popularity. This popularity is based on user votes, but is weighed using an intern algorithm on Tagdef.com
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tagdef.p.rapidapi.com/ff.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tagdef.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tagdef.p.rapidapi.com/{hashtag}.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tagdef.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get top definition
api_list.description: Returns the top definition for given hashtag. The top definition is calculated based on user votes, and weighed using an intern algorithm on Tagdef.com
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tagdef.p.rapidapi.com/one.ff.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tagdef.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tagdef.p.rapidapi.com/one.{hashtag}.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tagdef.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
